column4: my win7 install is no longer able to boot, from my grub2 menu, but i can still boot ubuntu. if i chooise to 'fix' my issue with the win7 setup disk, you you think i will loose my ability to boot to ubuntu??
quite possible ... I just ran through it and still can't boot win 7 ... but grub2 is still there
